title: Show Me American Size!
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Hey Maki, let’s go to that really good cafe Shioriko took us to the other day.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Ah, the one with cookies the size of a coaster, right? I was surprised at how big they were, but they were delicious.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Really? Don’t you want it to be at least the size of your palms? Japanese cookies are too small.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>The size of my palms!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Yeah. Have you never seen one? Then I’ll make it for you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You know how to make one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Nope, I’m gonna ask Ayumu. I’m sure she can do it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wait. So you aren’t going to do it yourself? We can’t just bother Ayumu like that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Why? Ayumu does everything I ask.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Then I’ll do it. In return, you can direct me on how big it should be.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Huh~, you can make one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>As long as there’s a recipe for it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I guess it can’t be helped. If you want it that much, I’ll go along with you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>!? Why do you make it sound like I’m the one who wanted to make cookies!? I’m doing this for you, you know!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
